physical_appearance: "The image shows a condiment holder. It has four circular slots and a ringed handle. It is grey in colour. Spherical stands at its base support the entire structure of the condiment. ""Strand Hotel Rangoon"" is engraved on the surface at the front. "
subject_terms_2: Kitchen utensils Implements, utensils, etc. Containers Strand Hotel (Rangoon, Burma)
